title: Replay download error
body: In patch 6.24 you can easily download replayss of your last 20 games. When i clcik on a download button, it is downloading and then it stops, and write ERROR or something like that, pls help

replies.body: Is your replay from the current patch?  Previous patches are not compatible, and won't load.  I recommend reporting this over at the[ client discussion ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion)boards if that's not the case for you.  Replays are still in testing, so it's important to get these things looked at.  Thanks for testing!
